text: Heli Susi (14 November 1929 â€“ 8 June 2020) was an Estonian teacher and translator. She was born in Tallinn. In 2018, she was elected a member of PEN International. She worked as a translator and taught German at the Tallinn Conservatory. Susi died on 8 June 2020 in Tallinn, aged 90. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:European translators Category:Estonian educators Category:People from Tallinn
title: Heli Susi
